import { Alert } from "@site/src/components/Alert";
import { SepBadge } from "@site/src/components/SepBadge";

<SepBadge tags={''} />

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Receiver"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/receivers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Creates a new Receiver.
Allows clients to create a single receiver record, which can later be referenced in payments or disbursements. 

<Alert>

This endpoint will create the receiver, but will not onboard them (SEP-24). Onboarding only happens when they have a valid payment pending processing. 

</Alert>

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
title={"Body"}
body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["external_id"],"properties":{"email":{"type":"string","description":"Email address of the receiver","format":"email"},"phone_number":{"type":"string","description":"Phone number of the receiver"},"external_id":{"type":"string","description":"External identifier for the receiver"},"verifications":{"type":"array","description":"Verification requirements for the receiver","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","enum":["date_of_birth","pin","national_id","year_month"],"description":"Type of verification required"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"Expected verification value"}},"required":["type","value"]}},"wallets":{"type":"array","description":"Wallet information for the receiver (max 1 wallet)","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"address":{"type":"string","description":"Stellar address of the wallet"},"memo":{"type":"string","description":"Optional memo for the wallet address"}},"required":["address"]},"maxItems":1}},"anyOf":[{"required":["email"]},{"required":["phone_number"]}],"oneOf":[{"required":["verifications"]},{"required":["wallets"]}]}}},"required":true}}>

</RequestSchema>

validation errors","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"},"extras":{"type":"object","description":"Additional error details"}}}}}}}}>

</StatusCodes>
